data.title: Carillon Park, Dayton,Ohio
data.meta_description: Experience Dayton's rich heritage of creativity and invention at Carillon Historical Park! Enjoy our beautiful 65-acre campus with 25 special exhibit buildings and structures ready for you to explore. See the actual 1905 Wright Flyer III.
data.text:
Directory Profile

Carillon Park

1000 Carillon Blvd

Dayton, OH, 45409

Experience Dayton's rich heritage of creativity and invention at Carillon Historical Park! Enjoy our beautiful 65-acre campus with 25 special exhibit buildings and structures ready for you to explore. See the actual 1905 Wright Flyer III.

Small Scale Train Rides at Carillon Park Railroad

8/17/2024

Take a ride on the mini-railroad at Carillon Park with the Carillon Park Rail & Steam Society.

Antique Fire Apparatus Show

8/31/2024

The Miami Valley Antique Fire Apparatus Association (MVAFAA) has partnered with Dayton History to present a family-friendly, educational day of fun at Carillon Historical Park.

Dayton Concours dElegance Preview Party

9/14/2024

A casual Preview Party, open to the public, on the grounds of the Carillon Historical Park.

Dayton Concours d Elegance

9/15/2024

Admire over 150 of the finest classic and antique automobiles and motorcycles in the country at Carillon Park.
